title: Diamond Chandbali Pendant - A Sparkling Symphony
materials: G-H Color). The pendant is finished with a high polish
enhancing its luster and showcasing the intricate detailing.
features: This pendant reimagines the classic Chandbali silhouette with a modern twist. Featuring a crescent shape top, embellished with graduating lines of shimmering diamonds and with floral motifs as separators with pear shaped dangling diamonds from the bottom line. Delicate diamond clusters and pear-shaped drops add a touch of ethereal charm, the design is light weight and perfect for everyday wear.
colors: Rose Gold and Dazzling White Diamonds.
occasions: or as an elegant addition to everyday attire. Pairs beautifully with both traditional Indian and Western outfits.
description: A harmonious blend of classic Indian design and contemporary aesthetics. The high-quality diamonds create a brilliant sparkle, making this pendant a true statement piece. Its versatile design ensures it can be worn for a variety of occasions, adding a touch of sophistication to any ensemble. Expertly crafted by our skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece is a testament to our commitment to excellence in jewelry making.
